org.apache.giraph.partition

接口 WorkerGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex value
    E - Edge value
    M - Message data
    所有已知实现类:
    HashRangeWorkerPartitioner, HashWorkerPartitioner, RangeWorkerPartitioner, SimpleRangeWorkerPartitioner

    public interface WorkerGraphPartitioner<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Stores the PartitionOwner objects from the master and provides the mapping of vertex to PartitionOwner. Also generates the partition owner implementation.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      PartitionOwner createPartitionOwner()
      Instantiate the PartitionOwner implementation used to read the master assignments.
      Collection<PartitionStats> finalizePartitionStats(Collection<PartitionStats> workerPartitionStats, PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
      At the end of a superstep, workers have PartitionStats generated for each of their partitions.
      PartitionOwner getPartitionOwner(I vertexId)
      Figure out the owner of a vertex
      Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> getPartitionOwners()
      Get a collection of the PartitionOwner objects.
      PartitionExchange updatePartitionOwners(WorkerInfo myWorkerInfo, Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> masterSetPartitionOwners, PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
      Get the partitions owners and update locally.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createPartitionOwner

        PartitionOwner createPartitionOwner()
        Instantiate the PartitionOwner implementation used to read the master assignments.
        返回:
        Instantiated PartitionOwner object

      • getPartitionOwner

        PartitionOwner getPartitionOwner(I vertexId)
        Figure out the owner of a vertex
        参数:
        vertexId - Vertex id to get the partition for
        返回:
        Correct partition owner

      • finalizePartitionStats

        Collection<PartitionStats> finalizePartitionStats(Collection<PartitionStats> workerPartitionStats,
                                                PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
        At the end of a superstep, workers have PartitionStats generated for each of their partitions. This method will allow the user to modify or create their own PartitionStats interfaces to send to the master.
        参数:
        workerPartitionStats - Stats generated by the infrastructure during the superstep
        partitionStore - Partition store for this worker (could be used to provide more useful stat information)
        返回:
        Final partition stats

      • updatePartitionOwners

        PartitionExchange updatePartitionOwners(WorkerInfo myWorkerInfo,
                                      Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> masterSetPartitionOwners,
                                      PartitionStore<I,V,E,M> partitionStore)
        Get the partitions owners and update locally. Returns the partitions to send to other workers and other dependencies.
        参数:
        myWorkerInfo - Worker info.
        masterSetPartitionOwners - Master set partition owners, received prior to beginning the superstep
        partitionStore - Partition store for this worker (can be used to fill the return map of partitions to send)
        返回:
        Information for the partition exchange.

      • getPartitionOwners

        Collection<? extends PartitionOwner> getPartitionOwners()
        Get a collection of the PartitionOwner objects.
        返回:
        Collection of owners for every partition.
